body: This has become a really huge problem recently for me.. Whenever I bridge my blocks just disappear. Is it my lag or a server issue?
body_tagged: This has become a really huge problem recently for me.. Whenever I bridge my blocks just disappear. Is it my lag or a server issue?
title: Blocks just vanishing...

replies.body: Would be on your side. Likely internet. Happened to me when getting 2000+ ping while downloading something.
replies.body_tagged: Would be on your side. Likely internet. Happened to me when getting 2000+ ping while downloading something.

replies.body:
NCP is not back.
Also there is a plugin called AntiCheat Ivy implemented to the plugin list. Its better than NCP and as i know its not the reason of this problem.

replies.body: You probably have bad connection. I used to get this alot until we upgraded out Internet speed. It happens when you build during a lag spike or something, and AntiCheat removes the blocks that you placed during the lag spike
